summary: This document is an email exchange from May 29, 2020, discussing the Netflix documentary about Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondents share notes and opinions on the documentary's pacing and the renewed public attention the case is receiving.

events.title: Release of Netflix Epstein Documentary
events.description: A new Netflix documentary series about Jeffrey Epstein is released and being watched by the correspondents.

events.title: Email Exchange About Documentary
events.description: An email exchange occurs where individuals discuss watching the Netflix documentary, share notes on it, and comment on the renewed public energy and pressure surrounding the Epstein case anniversary.

keyFacts: A Netflix documentary about Jeffrey Epstein was released and being discussed in May 2020.
The correspondents find the documentary's pacing 'tedious' and suggest it was stretched from a short series into a long one.
The email discusses a 'renewed energy (and pressure)' surrounding the anniversary of the Epstein case, indicating ongoing public and media interest.
The document is a personal email exchange, not an official legal or investigative record.
